incidents.name: [RBX8][Network] - Public Network R833B11 - R833B10 - R833B12 incident notification

incident_updates.body: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Our teams are continuing to fix the last remaining affected servers in the rack R833B11 We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Servers in the rack R833B10 and R833B12 are operational again. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue. Ongoing Actions : Our team is working to fix remaining servers in the rack R833B11. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Some servers in the rack R833B10 and R833B12 are operational again. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our offer on the specific rack R833B12 - R833B11 and R833B10. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 06/08/2025 13:00 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Public and Vrack netwok is temporarily unreachable for servers located in R833B12 - R833B11 and R833B10. Ongoing actions : Our teams are actively working to resolve the incident and restore services as quickly as possible We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 11/08/2025 04:00 UTC End time : 11/08/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : The cooling system's efficiency could be temporarily impacted for some servers, which could cause a decreased performance during this maintenance. As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 13/08/2025 09:50 UTC End time : 13/08/2025 10:50 UTC Service impact : Some servers might be temporarily unavailable during 30 minutes. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance. From 09:50 UTC to 10:50 UTC, the maintenance may temporarily affect availability of servers Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS4 are: T04A, T04B and T04C Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS5 are: T05A, T05B, T05C, T05D, T05E, T05F, T05G and T05H Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS5 are: T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS7 are: B702, B703, B707, B709, B710 and B716 Our technical teams will be mobilized throughout the maintenance to resolve any impact on your services. We apologize in advance for any inconvenience caused.
